articles.content: Investing.com -- Most Asian stocks fell sharply on Friday after a bigger-than-expected rate hike from the Bank of England pushed up concerns over tightening monetary policy, while a beat on Japanese … [+2417 chars]

articles.title: Record 75 Indian varsities feature in the Asia University Rankings - Economic Times
articles.description: A record number of Indian universities have made it to the Times Higher Education Asia University Rankings 2023, with 75 institutes featuring in the list, up from 71 last year. India is the third most-represented country in the rankings behind Japan, with 117…
